channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene's puzzling political transformation, explained
item.description: Once a fierce advocate for Trump and his MAGA base, Greene has broken with the president and resigned from Congress. New Yorker writer Charles Bethea ...

item.title: Attempting to predict the economy in 2026
item.description: Economists may have a pretty dismal record with predictions. But we're still interested in what they see in their non-existent crystal balls.

item.title: Hungarian filmmaker Béla Tarr — known for bleak, existential movies — has died
item.description: Tarr's films were long, dark, and often abstract explorations of everyday life and politics.

item.title: Edith Renfrow Smith, pioneer and witness to history, dies at 111
item.description: Last year, for Black History Month, NPR's Scott Simon spoke with Edith Renfrow Smith of Chicago, who has died at 111 years old.

item.title: Lawmakers split over Maduro's seizure. And, CDC cuts childhood vaccine schedule
item.description: Ousted Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro and his wife pleaded not guilty in New York yesterday. And, the CDC scales back routine childhood vaccine reco...

item.title: 3 Things We’re Doing in 2026 to (Actually) Retire with Rentals
item.description: 2026 is finally here! And if you can still read this sentence without seeing double, you’ve made it! But this year, things are going to be a little… d...

item.title: California lawmaker proposes a four-year ban on AI chatbots in kids’ toys
item.description: “Our children cannot be used as lab rats for Big Tech to experiment on,” Senator Steve Padilla said. He just introduced a bill to ban AI chatbots in t...

item.title: Fifth anniversary of the Jan. 6 attack brings fresh division to the Capitol
Foreclosure Notice of Sales Jump 27.9% Year Over Year: What the Notice of Sale Surge Means For Real Estate Investors
item.description: Foreclosure markets move in stages. First come early filings. Then come the auctions. And when auction volume rises, it signals one thing clearly: Dis...

item.title: Uvalde schools officer did nothing until it was too late during shooting, prosecutor says
item.description: A Texas prosecutor says a school police officer made no attempt to distract or stop the gunman during the school shooting in Uvalde in 2022.

item.title: LMArena lands $1.7B valuation four months after launching its product
item.description: LMArena, which started as a UC Berkeley research project, has raised about $250 million total and become a unicorn in about seven months.

item.title: xAI says it raised $20B in Series E funding
item.description: Nvidia is among the many investors, but xAI has not disclosed if these investments come in the form of equity or debt.

item.title: The most bizarre tech announced so far at CES 2026
item.description: From an AI panda pet to an anime girl hologram for your desk, here are the wildest products at CES 2026.

item.title: Intel is building a handheld gaming platform including a dedicated chip
item.description: Intel has been building chips designed for gaming PCs for years but the company is now moving into handheld devices too.

item.title: Alaska Airlines pilot who safely landed plane after panel blew out says Boeing unfairly blamed him
